data.title: Dynasties Of China
data.text:
In the tables below, the modern name of the capital is followed by its ancient name, where applicable, in parentheses.

DateDynastyCapital 2200-1700 BCXia(?) 1700-1050ShangAnyang (Yin) after 1350 1050-770Western ZhouXi'an (Haojing) 770-221Eastern ZhouLuoyang (770 - 476)(Spring and Autumn) Luoyang (476 - 221)(Warring States)Luoyang 221-206QinXi'an (Xianyang) 206 BC - AD 8Western HanXi'an (Chang'an) (9-23)(Wang Mang)Xi'an (Chang'an) 25-220Eastern HanLuoyang (220-280)(Three Kingdoms)(various)
